title: Tax Exempt Entity
description: Tax Exempt Entity codes for insurance operations.

concept.definition: Individual who is a member of a recognized Indigenous nation or Indian band and may be exempt from certain taxes under the Indian Act or other legislation.
A recognized Indigenous band or First Nation community that holds collective rights and may have tax-exempt status under Canadian law.
An organization or entity established and authorized by an Indigenous band to conduct business or provide services on behalf of the band.

designation.value: Entité mandatée par une bande autochtone

concept.definition: Individual or organization with diplomatic immunity or privileges under international law, which may include exemption from certain taxes and duties.
Member of the clergy or religious official who may be eligible for tax exemptions related to their religious duties and residence.
Organization registered as a charitable entity with tax authorities and eligible for tax-exempt status on qualifying activities and donations.
Government department, agency, or Crown corporation that is exempt from certain taxes by virtue of its governmental status.
